Body: Dear Advisors, The seminar information held in Japan will be distributed in Japanese only.  各位顾问 在日本舉行的研討會信息僅以日語發布。   各位顧問 在日本举行的研讨会信息仅以日语发布。  회원 여러분  일본에서 개최하는 세미나 정보에 대해, 일본어로만 제공합니다.   日本で開催するセミナー情報につき、日本語のみで配信します。    アドバイザー各位    日本での、説明会の日程が決まりました。  東京、大阪、広島、石川で開催されます！  生まれ変わるSNBL、イーサクラブの最新情報をご確認ください！     ◆今回のセミナーで得られる情報  ・SNBL→SNBXのバージョンアップについて  ・ワールドステージについて  ・I88の現状とこれから  ・新取引所「ZePTO HASH」とは  ・イーサクラブキャンペーン情報     ●東京　　7/29（月）　昼・夜  ①14:00～16:00  ②18:30～20:00  会場：五反田スタンダード会議室　8階B会議室  https://gotanda.spaceuse.net/map/  住所：東京都品川区東五反田2-3-5 五反田中央ビル  講師：Mr.Ethereum/梅本昌吾4★DA  参加費：無料 ※ウェビナーで公開予定     ●大阪　　7/31（水）13：00～  会場：創志　貸し会議室  住所：大阪市中央区道修町1-2-4源実業北浜ビル5F  http://www.so-si.org/conferenceRoom/  講師：Mr.Ethereum/梅本昌吾4★DA  参加費：無料     ●石川県　　8/6（火）18：30～  会場：野々市市交遊舎  住所：石川県野々市市二日市1 -2  https://www.city.nonoichi.lg.jp/soshiki/9/764.html  講師：Mr.Ethereum/梅本昌吾4★DA  参加費：無料     ●広島　　　8/9（金）19：00～  会場：TKPガーデンシティPREMIUM広島駅前　ミーティングルーム5C  住所：広島県広島市南区大須賀町13-9  https://www.kashikaigishitsu.net/facilitys/gcp-hiroshima-ekimae/access/  講師：Mr.Ethereum/梅本昌吾4★DA  参加費：無料    ETH CLUBログインページ https:// member.eth-club .com/  ☆iLexExchange☆ https://www. ilexexchange .com HitBTC https://hitbtc.com/ LIVECOIN https://www.livecoin.net/ MERCATOX https://mercatox.com/ DEXDELTA https://dexdelta.github.io SouthExchange https://www.southxchange.com    ※この送信アドレスは配信専用です。 ------------------------------------------- イーサクラブカスタマーサポート customer@eth-club.com

Author: snowballtokencoin
Title: [ANN]Snowballcoin[SNBL]Start
Body: Dear Advisors, Japanese seminar information will be distributed only in Japanese.  各位顾问 日语研讨会信息仅以日语发布。  各位顧問 日語研討會信息僅以日語發布。  회원 여러분 일본어 세미나 정보에 대해, 일본어로만 제공합니다.  日本語のセミナー情報につき、日本語のみで配信します。    アドバイザー各位  お待たせしました。 7/29（月)東京で開催されたセミナーを収録した映像を公開します。 前半 https://youtu.be/SSHH7N_Fzo4 後半 https://youtu.be/a25tmYFsc3I  なお、この時発表となった内容は、改めてメール、インフォメーションにてご案内させていただきます。  また、この内容のおさらいと、ラストプロモーションプロモーション用として新規の方向けの内容を合わせてウェビナーを、本日開催します。スマホをお持ちであれば、どこからでもご参加可能ですので、お誘いあわせの上ご参加ください。  ■ETH CLUBウェビナー  日時：8/12(月祝)17:00～(30分前オープン) 参加URL：https://zoom.us/j/972134784 ミーティングID：972134784 講師：新渡戸諭吉  今回のウェビナーで得られる情報 ・ETH CLUBとは ・SNBL→SNBXのバージョンアップについて ・ワールドステージについて ・I88の現状とこれから ・新取引所「ZePTO HASH」とは ・イーサクラブプロモーション情報  ▼ウェビナーに参加するには(事前申し込み不要)  セミナー開始時間前に https://zoom.us/j/972134784 からアクセスしてください。  ※セミナーは定刻に始めますので、開始前にオンラインセミナールームに入室ください。30分前から開けておきます。 ※アプリからは、ミーティングID972-134-784で入室可能です。 ※スマホでも、パソコンでも参加できますが、パソコンはスピーカーかイヤホン機能が付いていることが必須です。  〇講師紹介：新渡戸諭吉 Mr.Ethereumの右腕。 Mr.Ethereumの経営する創業12年会員9万人を有するMLM企業の広報宣伝担当の敏腕マネージャー。 前職は、MLM業界最大規模のサイトを運営する企業の副社長で、MLMの経営陣、トップリーダーとも親交を深める。 このとき、Mr.Ethereumと出会い創業期から入社、業界記録を打ち立てる力となる。 新渡戸諭吉は、新渡戸稲造と福澤諭吉を合体させたクリプトネームである。 年間400杯を食すラーメンフリークでもある。   ETH CLUBログインページ https:// member.eth-club .com/  ☆iLexExchange☆ https://www. ilexexchange .com HitBTC https://hitbtc.com/ LIVECOIN https://www.livecoin.net/ MERCATOX https://mercatox.com/ DEXDELTA https://dexdelta.github.io SouthExchange https://www.southxchange.com      ※この送信アドレスは配信専用です。 ------------------------------------------- イーサクラブカスタマーサポート customer@eth-club.com   https://twitter.com/snowball_coin/status/1160740073182121984/photo/1

Author: snowballtokencoin
Title: [ANN]Snowballcoin[SNBL]Start
Body: [Important] Information on SNBL hard forks  To all advisors,  In order to enhance security and to comply with the latest ERC-20, SNBL hard forks to SNBX. As for ETH CLUB’s last promotion, we are asking you to confirm since we will be taking a special response to advisors for a limited time. In addition, the world stage reward will be paid by SNBX at the end of August.  ◆◆ SNBX details ◆◆ ・ Token name: SnowBallX ・ Number of issued cards: 24,000,000,000 -Decimal places: 8 digits ・ Compliant with latest ERC20 ・ Initial operation as private coin ・ Listing is scheduled half a year later  ◆◆ ETH CLUB Last Promotion ◆◆ Target: ETH CLUB Advisor ・ SNBL → SNBX exchange rights (twice until the end of September) ・ You can purchase SNBL large (from $ 2,000) from Bronze Advisor  ◆◆ About SNBX exchange ◆◆  ◎ Replacement with 1SNBL ⇒ 2SNBX is limited until 9/30.  ◎ SNBX cannot be returned to SNBL after replacement.  ◎ SNBX cannot send money for a certain period.  ◎ Since all SNBLs within this account are eligible for exchange, if you want to keep it as SNBL, please move the SNBL you want to keep to an external wallet before replacing it.   ◎ A PIN (PIN) is always required for SNBX replacement. Check the “PIN” in advance. * “PIN” is used for remittance, etc., so it is different from the login password.  ■ Registration and confirmation of personal identification number (PIN) After logging in, click on “Profile” in the menu and click on the 3rd on3, “Register PIN”.  ▽ When registered PIN (PIN) has been registered “Registered PIN” is displayed, so no registration is required.  ▽ When the registered PIN (PIN) is not registered “Registered PIN” is not displayed. Register your PIN (6-15 alphanumeric characters)  ■ SNBX replacement procedure ① After logging in, click “Account” in the menu. (2) Under each wallet, “If you want to exchange SNBL with SNBX, click here.” Click “Next”. (3) Check the precautions for the exchange. ④ Enter your PIN and click “Exchange”. ⑤ Completion * You can see the manual of the exchange procedure on the download page.  ◆◆ Others ◆◆  ■ The video of the Tokyo Seminar on July 29th (Monday), when the details of the above contents were announced (Japanese), has been uploaded. first half https://youtu.be/SSHH7N_Fzo4 Latter half https://youtu.be/a25tmYFsc3I  ■ ETH CLUB Webinar (Japanese)  Date: (Japan Time) 8/27 (Tue) 18:00-(Open 30 minutes before) https://zoom.us/j/770415244 Meeting ID: 770415244 Lecturer: Yukichi Nitobe    Information obtained from this webinar ・ About ETH CLUB ・ About SNBL → SNBX upgrade ・ About World Stage ・ Current status and future of I88 ・ What is the new exchange `` ZePTO HASH ''? ・ Ether Club Promotion Information  ▼ To participate in the webinar (no prior application required)  Before the seminar starts, please access from, https://zoom.us/j/770415244  * The seminar will start on time, so please enter the online seminar room before the seminar starts. It will be open 30 minutes before the starting time. * Meeting ID 770-415-244 can be entered from the app. * You can participate with a smartphone or a computer, but the computer must have a speaker or earphone function. * Only those who have entered an Ether Club nickname in the chat field will be able to view the video recorded later.   ETH CLUB login page https:// member.eth-club .com/  ☆iLexExchange☆ https://www. ilexexchange .com HitBTC https://hitbtc.com/ LIVECOIN https://www.livecoin.net/ MERCATOX https://mercatox.com/ DEXDELTA https://dexdelta.github.io SouthExchange https://www.southxchange.com       ※ This sending address is for delivery only. ------------------------------------------------------------- ETH CLUB Customer Support customer@eth-club.com  https://gamelimited.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/08-21-2019.png

Author: snowballtokencoin
Title: [ANN]Snowballcoin[SNBL]Start
Body: Dear Advisors  At the "ETH - CLUB international KICKOFF EVENT in Tokyo" held on July 30, a new compensation plan and a new promotion were announced.  ★★New Compensation Plan★★  Even with the same matching acquisition level, you can now get a matching bonus with fewer positions than before. Also, the title names has been changed in part. The changes are as follows. This change has been effective since Aug 1.  Title / Number of Right and Left Position / Matching acquisition level  1★PA(Platinum Agents) /  200P each    /  5Lv 1★DA(Diamond Agents)/   400P each   /  6Lv 2★DA(Diamond Agents) /  600P each   /  7Lv 3★DA(Diamond Agents) /  800P each   /  8Lv 4★DA(Diamond Agents) / 1,000P each /  9Lv 5★DA(Diamond Agents) / 2,000P each /10Lv  ※See the images below.  ★ ★ New promotion ★ ★  [Promotion Period] August 1, 2018 (Wed) ~ October 31, 2018 (Wed)  [Contents] We invite you to Hong Kong · Macau tour if you achieve the following condition ① ② in the period. ※ You can earn the tour participation rights of ① ② in duplicate.  [Tour dates] The second half of January, 2019  ① Recruit promotion · Those who directly recruited more than 20 people within the period. ※ BA (1P) registration will not be counted. ※ If you introduce more than 20 people, we invite one person every 20 people.  ② W Title Up Promotion · UP in two or more ranks in the new compensation plan above within the period. ※ The minimum title of the achievement is 1 ★ DA.  [Title Bonus] · The following bonus will be generated for the highest title achieved within the period. 5 ★ DA ⇒ 1,000,000 SNBL 4 ★ DA ⇒ 800 000 SNBL 3 ★ DA ⇒ 500,000 SNBL 2 ★ DA ⇒ 300,000 SNBL 1 ★ DA ⇒ 200,000 SNBL 1 ★ PA ⇒ 100,000 SNBL PA ⇒ 50,000 SNBL ※ Each title bonus can not be duplicated. Author: snowballtokencoin
Title: [ANN]Snowballcoin[SNBL]Start
Body: Dear Advisors,  Thank you for your ongoing support.  This is about credit card payment we have been offering at registration.  In recent years, major credit card companies such as VISA, MASTER are strengthening their usage restrictions in the cryptocurrency industry.  In consideration of the situation surrounding the cryptocurrency industry,  We regret to inform you that our settlement agency has decided to quit credit card payment. We deeply apologize for the inconvenience to those who have been using this service.  Thank you for your kind understanding.

Author: snowballtokencoin
Title: [ANN]Snowballcoin[SNBL]Start
Body: ★★Notice of listing★★  Dear advisors,  Thank you for your ongoing support.  This is the sixth report of listing. At the end of this month, we will be listed on "iLexExchange" which has license of Estonia! This is a very important listing related to the future business tie-ups with i88! SNBL is registered already in the internal wallet and it is scheduled to be listed officially at the end of the month.  iLexExchange is the latest crypto currency exchange developed with cutting edge  technology and implements various trading models. Unlike exchanges that have been listed so far, you can trade with legal currencies such as USD, EUR, PHP, JPY. Purchasing crypto currency with credit card and withdraw from ATM by debit card is also available. This makes changing SNBL into cash very simple.   ◆ Details of iLexExchange  iLexExchange is a new crypto currency exchange operated by TILA EXCHANGE OÜ (license no.FVR000200) which released their service on October 2018. It is one of the few exchange in the world which has 2 licenses, crypto currency exchange license and wallet license in Estonia which is EU member and where many Fintech companies gather. If you are interested, please check the website below.  URL： https://europa.eu/european-union/about-eu/countries/member-countries/estonia_en   With affiliation and collaboration with many financial institutions, iLexExchange can deal not only between crypto  currencies but also with legal currencies, and can deposit and withdraw in various ways including crypto currency and legal currency. And in order to improve user convenience, we realized purchasing crypto currency with credit card.  We have prepared various methods for transaction such as general relative transaction, Margin transaction which can perform leveraged transaction, OTC service for large purchase. We hope you'll be looking forward to it. Author: snowballtokencoin
Title: [ANN]Snowballcoin[SNBL]Start
Body: Monetary Donation for West Japan Heavy Rain Disaster  Dear Advisors,  Due to the Typhoon Prapiroon and following heavy rains, it caused tremendous damages in western Japan. Landslides and mudflows killed at least 220 people and have forced millions to live in evacuation shelters as of July 22. This is the worst weather disaster in decades in Japan. The Japanese government designated it as Specified Disaster for the first time other than earthquakes.  We would like to express our sympathies to all the victims of this heavy rain disaster. We pray for the confirmation of the safety of the missing people and early restoration of the affected areas.  ETH Club will accept the donation to support the victims of the disaster.(Donation Name “West Japan Heavy Rain Disaster Support Donation”) Your cooperation will be highly appreciated. The details are shown below.  [Period] Until December 31, 2018 (Mon)   [How to donate] Login ETH Club account and click “Donation” tag. ※SNBL(US Dollars)   [Usage of the donation]  We will discuss with advisors who live in the affected areas first. Then, we plan to send monetary donation to the disaster stricken Prefectures or Cities. And it may also be used for the damaged area restoration and livelihood recovery activities for the victims.    ※ This sending address is for delivery only.  ------------------------------------------------------------- ETH CLUB Customer Support customer@eth-club.com

Author: snowballtokencoin
Title: [ANN]Snowballcoin[SNBL]Start
Body: THE ORIGIN OF SNOWBALL  As the chairman and CEO of the famous investment firm Berkshire Hathaway, Warren Buffett is one of the most respected investors in the world. He has cooperated over 300 hours of interviews to speak about his entire life with more that 250 of his friends and family. After 5 years, a USA best seller biography "Snow Ball" was finally published. We have been inspired by his life, thus decided to name our project, Snow Ball.  What is Snowball Coin? The Snowball is a new crypto currency that we will produce, basing on Ethereum.  The Snowball coin is a token that we will issue, basing on Ethereum. It will a crypto currency that can be used for all kinds of entertainment.  To be specific, we plan to make the Snowball coin usable for online games, shopping, travel, concerts, events, sports watching, and asset management.  WHITE PAPER https://gamelimited.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/SBWP_ver02_ENG_180319.pdf  VIDEO https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=8&v=fsvH6IfWiSM  PRACTICALITY OF THE SNOWBALL COIN Online Gaming We will make the Snowball coin usable for online games, application games and other commonly available games. First we will integrate it in our original game, then we will distribute it as a coin that can be used in other various online games.   Shopping We will distribute the Snowball token as a coin that can actually buy items at online shopping malls. In addition, we will introduce the Snowball transaction system to retailers around the world and expand the network of the Snowball partnership   Asset Management We are going to develop the Easy Trade System as an application. You will be able to trade crypto currencies on the exchange markets.   Wallet We prepare a "wallet" that can store various crypto currencies, such as bitcoin, bitcoincash, and ethereum. Also we plan to introduce a system that can exchange crypto currencies for conventional currrency. This wallet system lets you access the shopping mall and coupon system directly.   Travel, Concerts and Events We plan to issue coupons for traveling around the world. There is the possibility of experiencing space travel with the Snowball coin in the future. this project is now in progress. Our coupon can also be used for various entertainment such as concerts and events.   Sports We will make the Snowball coin payable for tickets of various sports events, such as soccer, baseball, and basketball. We are considering a sponsorship of the Tokyo Olympic Game in 2020   Security We are going to build a mechanism that keeps the Snowball coin in the hardware wallet. This will solve the security problem of crypto currency that has causing hacking troubles these days.   Social Contribution Activities We will expand our social contribution activities. As an amount of the Snowball coin in circulation increases, children all over the world will benefit. We are going to set up the Snowball scholarship for students who wish to go on to colleges and vocational schools.  Basic Information Currency name SNOWBALL COIN  Code SNBL  Expected release date March 2018  Developer GAME Limited  Official site https://onlinegamecoin.com  Amount in circulation 2,400,000,000  Decimal Digits 8   Visit now http://gamelimited.net/bitcointalk

Author: snowballtokencoin
Title: [ANN]Snowballcoin[SNBL]Start
Body: ★★ Up to 144% reduction !!★★  Awaiting "TDS", it's time to start!  "TDS" stands for Time Deposit System. The Time Deposit System is a system that obtains a specified return when depositing (depositing) SNBL for a certain period. Returns are calculated everyday and paid with rewards.  Example: For Plan D at $ 12,000.00 with 360-day course → SNBL (0.4%) at $ 48.00 daily, SNBL (144%) for 360 days total $ 17,280.00 * The percentage of return is the sum of matching and principal.  After completion of the period, deposited amount will be refunded to the number of SNBL at the time of application. Returns will be subjected to the matching bonus, and up to 10 stages will be paid according to the title.  * Midway Cancellation or switch of Plan will not be accepted.  ※ The maximum amount will be as follows:  BA (1P) ⇒ $ 12,000.00 SA (3P) ⇒ $ 36,000.00 GA (7P) ⇒ $ 84,000.00
